name: black and white stripe katie skirt
description:
A colorful stripe pattern gives this full, feminine, skirt a pop of panache while the stitched down pleats further define the waist. Envision pairing this skirt with a crisp button-down or colorful cardigan for a true statement outfit.

This skirt is specially made to order. The stripe fabric is a thick, heavy handed cotton with front pleats and back gathers. The skirt closes on the side with an invisible zipper. It is fully lined in a lovely light grey satin.

It is my heart's desire for everyone who likes my designs to be able to wear them. Please send me your measurements in the notes at checkout. There is no extra charge for a custom size. Charming comes in all shapes and sizes!
